text: Edwin B. "Ted" Erickson (1938 - January 7, 2019) was an American politician and businessman. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, but raised in Bryn Mawr. He was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania Senate, representing the 26th District from 2001 to 2015. Erickson died on January 7, 2019 in Reading, Pennsylvania, aged 80. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2019 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Businesspeople from Philadelphia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania
title: Edwin Erickson
